00033 B3_ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(class ) b3StridingMeshInterface
00034 {
00035         protected:
00036         
00037                 b3Vector3 m_scaling;
00038 
00039         public:
00040                 B3_DECLARE_ALIGNED_ALLOCATOR();
00041                 
00042                 b3StridingMeshInterface() :m_scaling(b3MakeVector3(b3Scalar(1.),b3Scalar(1.),b3Scalar(1.)))
00043                 {
00044 
00045                 }
00046 
00047                 virtual ~b3StridingMeshInterface();
00048 
00049 
00050 
00051                 virtual void    InternalProcessAllTriangles(b3InternalTriangleIndexCallback* callback,const b3Vector3& aabbMin,const b3Vector3& aabbMax) const;
00052 
00054                 void    calculateAabbBruteForce(b3Vector3& aabbMin,b3Vector3& aabbMax);
00055 
00061                 virtual void    getLockedVertexIndexBase(unsigned char **vertexbase, int& numverts,PHY_ScalarType& type, int& stride,unsigned char **indexbase,int & indexstride,int& numfaces,PHY_ScalarType& indicestype,int subpart=0)=0;
00062                 
00063                 virtual void    getLockedReadOnlyVertexIndexBase(const unsigned char **vertexbase, int& numverts,PHY_ScalarType& type, int& stride,const unsigned char **indexbase,int & indexstride,int& numfaces,PHY_ScalarType& indicestype,int subpart=0) const=0;
00064         
00067                 virtual void    unLockVertexBase(int subpart)=0;
00068 
00069                 virtual void    unLockReadOnlyVertexBase(int subpart) const=0;
00070 
00071 
00074                 virtual int             getNumSubParts() const=0;
00075 
00076                 virtual void    preallocateVertices(int numverts)=0;
00077                 virtual void    preallocateIndices(int numindices)=0;
00078 
00079                 virtual bool    hasPremadeAabb() const { return false; }
00080                 virtual void    setPremadeAabb(const b3Vector3& aabbMin, const b3Vector3& aabbMax ) const
00081                 {
00082                         (void) aabbMin;
00083                         (void) aabbMax;
00084                 }
00085                 virtual void    getPremadeAabb(b3Vector3* aabbMin, b3Vector3* aabbMax ) const
00086         {
00087             (void) aabbMin;
00088             (void) aabbMax;
00089         }
00090 
00091                 const b3Vector3&        getScaling() const {
00092                         return m_scaling;
00093                 }
00094                 void    setScaling(const b3Vector3& scaling)
00095                 {
00096                         m_scaling = scaling;
00097                 }
00098

00132 struct  b3MeshPartData
00133 {
00134         b3Vector3FloatData                      *m_vertices3f;
00135         b3Vector3DoubleData                     *m_vertices3d;
00136 
00137         b3IntIndexData                          *m_indices32;
00138         b3ShortIntIndexTripletData      *m_3indices16;
00139         b3CharIndexTripletData          *m_3indices8;
00140 
00141         b3ShortIntIndexData                     *m_indices16;//backwards compatibility
00142 
00143         int                     m_numTriangles;//length of m_indices = m_numTriangles
00144         int                     m_numVertices;
00145 };

00160 B3_FORCE_INLINE int     b3StridingMeshInterface::calculateSerializeBufferSize() const
